channel.title: Robocall on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Robocall on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Chinese Robocall Blues
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Recently, I got a phone call from a number I’d never seen before. In other words, an average day. But this call was weird, largely because it was decidedly not for me. It sounded like Chinese, which was confirmed when I had the bright idea of holding my phone against my laptop’s microphone so Google Translate could make it out. Suddenly, it became slightly more clear: The message was a robocall—a strange one at that, one that suggested some sort of immigration trouble for the caller.
